Text: Re Taxestaxing agency does not have contract numbers etc The taxpayer is required to file a tax rendition return with the taxing authority annually by April st From the information provided on the rendition the taxing agency will generate a taxable value In the case of tax year the taxing jurisdiction probably set an arbitrary value based on prior years values The value for tax year could be higher or lower but at this time it is too late to protest
